question:
[Jamie] and her son, [Joel], went to the park, and had a wonderful time. [Charles] was so happy for his brother, [Daniel], getting a promotion. [Lisa] threw a part for her sister, [Carolyn], after she retired. Their brother, [Robert], catered the event with the help of his father, [Roger]. [Joel] wanted to buy his sister a birthday gift but her son [Charles] said she did n't want any gifts. [Daniel] was so happy for his brother, [Roger], getting a promotion. [Sarah] spent a great day shopping with her daughter, [Jamie].
Question: How is [Lisa] related to [Sarah]?
